featured.text: Most Indian women do not like to wear bindis anymore.
“My weight dropped to 48.3 from 54.4 kilograms, and my classmates won’t be able to call me ‘porker’ anymore,” Chang said happily.
As soon as the couple realized that they didn’t love each other anymore, they _____.

definition.zh_def: 不再，表示不再發生或不再存在。
definition.example: I don't want to play that game anymore.
